articles.author: Lauren Thomas, Ben Dummett
articles.title: Exclusive | Kimberly-Clark Nears Roughly $3.5 Billion Sale of International Tissue Business - WSJ
articles.description: The maker of Kleenex is expected to sell the tissue business outside of North America to Brazil’s Suzano
articles.content:
Kimberly-ClarkKMB-0.77%decrease; red down pointing triangle
is nearing a sale of its Kleenex and tissue businesses outside of North America for around $3.5 billion, part of an attempt by the maker o… [+498 chars]
